text: nanita bhumiyil oru khaliphaye niyeagikkan peakukayan enn ninrenathan malakkukaleat paranna sandarbham (srad'dhikkuka). avar parannu: avite kulappamuntakkukayum raktam cintukayum ceyyunnavareyanea ni niyeagikkunnatâ€Œ? nannalakatte ninremahatvatte prakirttikkukayum, ninreparisud'dhiye valttukayum ceyyunnavarallea. avan (allahu) parannu: ninnalkkarinnukutattat enikkariyam
